{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = RD-Link_V-FL500.png |image1_size = 200px |caption = SkyLink Home Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://skylink.ru/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = SkyLink |model = V-FL500 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (H1) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/12/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/SkyLink_V-FL500 |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = 4G LTE router, LTE modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64FVSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Fidelix;FMN1ED1SBJ-50IA; |flash2size = 128 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 128 |ram2chip = Fidelix;FMN1ED1SBJ-50IA; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D8:19:CE, 88:5D:90 |oui = D8:19:CE, 88:5D:90
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;Breed; |stockos = Linux;OpenWrt-deriv (Unitac);
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 (slave), |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = LTE, SIM Card slot, Li-ion battery, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Unitac |manuf_model = FX836AMB |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = SkyLink, Tele2, BeeLine, MTS, ice.net, |eoldate = 03/18/2016 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = none (internal) |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = NTmore NTLM-500 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Altair;ALT3800-B0; |rad2chip2 = Altair;ALT6300; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, SMA |rad2stand = LTE (Cat.4)
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Web UI: http://10.0.0.1/devdiag.html
<!-- *[https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=827515 ''SkyLink V-FL500'' on '''4pda''' forums] (RU) --> :LTE FDD 450/800/1800/2600 MHz (Band 3/7/20/31) :Chipset: ''Altair'' [https://altair-semi.com/products/alt3800/ ALT3800]/ALT6300, RAM: 128MB
===Models=== * SkyLink H1 (CelaLink) - No battery, 1x USB 2.0 port, 4x FE ports <!-- H1 - Zioncom --> * SkyLink V-FL500 (Unitac) - Li-ion battery (1500mAh), 3x FE port * SkyLink Mini M1 ([https://altair-semi.com/testimonials/ AsiaTelco]) - Li-ion battery (1800mAh), Display
===Hardware=== *'''LTE Modem:''' Model: [http://www.ntmore.kr/?act=info.page&pcode=NTLM-100 NTmore NTLM-500] :[https://cs5-1.4pda.to/11841074/20171231_213829.jpg LTE Module] (Mini PCIe) FW: NTM-M500 :SoC: ''Altair'' [https://altair-semi.com/products/alt3800/ ALT3800-B0] (ML610/M630) :ALT6300 - LTE TDD/FDD RF Transceiver :Flash/RAM: ''Fidelix'' [https://www.elnec.com/en/device/Fidelix/FMN1ED1SBJ+%5BFBGA130%5D/ FMN1ED1SBJ-50IA] *TRANS: OCD H1601DG, H2001DG
==Links of Interest== ===Firmware=== *OpenWrt: [http://cyberwrt.ru/application/firmwares/MT7620N/cyberwrt-mt7620n-rt-n14u-squashfs-sysupgrade.bin by CyberWRT.RU] • [https://yadi.sk/d/O_MazEb_6Jh6lQ by 4PDA.RU] :Flash can be flashed with [http://cyberwrt.ru/application/firmwares/MT7620N/u-boot/u-boot-nexx-3020-7620.bin U-Boot] for [[ASUS RT-N14U]]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
[[Category:English Documentation]]
